1.title: Coolest Races on Earth

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Let the races begin. We'll bounce, sail, run, and tear our way around the globe to find the coolest races on earth. Hang on tight because we're racing to the finish line.

2.title: The South Pacific

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: We set sail to one of the most beautiful regions on the planet: The South Pacific. We'll take island hopping to the extreme as we explore the beautiful beaches and incredible native cultures that The South Pacific has to offer.

3.title: Historical Hawaiian Adventure

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: We'll go on a historical Hawaiian adventure you won't want to miss. From a visit to Pearl Harbor to a trek through Halealaka National Park. Get ready to check out some of the most beautiful beaches, landscapes, and hotels on the planet.

4.title: Rustic Adventures

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: We trek deep into the words, explore glaciers and massive mountains, and hang with some of the wildest company the world has to offer. Get ready to discover some of the craziest, remote locations on this rustic adventure.

5.title: Escape from the Cold

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: It's time to escape the cold. Travel with us to the stunning islands of the Caribbean. Experience the exotic culture of Thailand. And explore the beautiful island territory of Bermuda.

6.title: Extreme Boating

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Grab your captain's hat and come on board as we take boating to the extreme. We'll hit the high seas on some high-speed power boats, historic ships, and even canoes made out of concrete.

7.title: Coolest Natural Wonders

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: We'll trek through Mother Nature's gallery of natural wonders. From hiking through glaciers, to climbing mountains, and taking a dip underneath some of the coolest waterfalls on Earth.

8.title: Coolest European Vacation

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Grab your Euro Passes....we're exploring some of the coolest cities that Europe has to offer. From one of Europe's most progressive cities, to the world's most famous mountain ranges, and even a city that's musically inspired.

9.title: Coolest Latin American Vacation

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: We travel down to Latin America for some fun in the sun. From scuba diving in Belize, to passing through the Panama Canal, and some time on the beach in Central America. Let's discover the Coolest Latin American vacation.

10.title: Best of the U.K.

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: It's time to head to Great Britain. We'll visit some English countryside's, check out some Scottish fashion trends, and try out some crazy Welsh words. It's the best of the U.K..

11.title: Coolest Honeymoons

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: We'll seek out some honeymooning getaways in unexpected places. From a hotel made entirely of ice, to a Manhattan getaway that's straight from a Hollywood film set, and a Bavarian-style retreat that provides a cozy little escape.

12.title: Off the Beaten Path Getaways

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: We bounce around to some of the coolest off the beaten path hotels, lodges, cabins, and camps around the world. From tree houses to exotic lodges. Let's discover some of the coolest off the beaten path getaways.

13.title: Coolest Historical Vacations

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: We set sail, but never leave the dock, as we check out the coolest historical vacations from around the world. We'll stay in the lap of luxury just minutes from some of the world's most famous ruins.

1.title: Extreme Sports in New Zealand, Ghost Tours in Savannah, and the World's Most Exotic Hotels

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: We go skydiving, jet boating, and bungee jumping in the adventure capital of the world, New Zealand. Then, we'll check in, to check out some of the world's most bizarre, extraordinary, and exotic hotels above ground and below.

2.title: A Day Trip Up America's West Coast, from California to Alaska

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: We're taking you on a road trip up America's Pacific coast from Los Angeles to Seattle and north to the rugged 49th state, Alaska. So grab your gear, your board, and your appetite, because where we're going you'll need the fuel.

3.title: What's Hot in Chile

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Chile, the South American nation of extreme contrasts, where modern life and ancient history blend and big cities are just minutes away from exotic warm islands and frosty getaways.

4.title: The Coolest Places to See Wildlife: Tanzania, the Great Barrier Reef, and the Amazon Rainforest

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: We're off to Tanzania's Serengeti National Park to follow wildebeests and big cats. Then we'll dive under Australia's Technicolor Great Barrier Reef and take a boat into the heart of the most diverse place on earth, the Amazon Rainforest.

5.title: America's National Parks

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: We're motoring across America on an adventure to explore its greatest National Parks. We'll climb Yosemite's El Cap, cheat on Yellowstone's Old Faithful, and uncover the reason these stones are moving by themselves across Death Valley.

6.title: Top and Bottom: The World Above the 60th Parallel and Below

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: We're plotting a course for global adventure, exploring amazing places at the top of the world and at the bottom, from Iceland to the tip of Argentina and northern Canada to Tasmania.

7.title: England and Wales: Castles, Baths, and Tubing

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: We're crossing the English Channel to Great Britain, the land of castles and cathedrals, nobles and knights, Beefeaters, and Big Ben. Hop aboard the double-decker, and don't forget your brolly.

8.title: Beaches, Castles, and the Happiest Place on Earth: The Florida Keys, Norway, Scotland, and Croatia

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: We're on the road to happiness. If you're looking for an ocean of enjoyment and fun in the sun, we've got the keys...the Florida Keys, that is. Next, grab your parka. We're taking you to one of the happiest countries on the planet.

9.title: The World's Coolest Ruins

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: We're on the road to ruins...ancient ruins that is. Breathtaking, mysterious, and in every way awesome. From the Great Pyramid of Giza to the Great Wall of China, and from grand temples to dramatic dwellings.

10.title: Australian Adventure

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: We're heading down under to one of the coolest continents on earth...Australia. We'll go surfing and sunbathing on Sydney's amazing beaches, cross the legendary outback, and get to the bottom...and the top of Uluru.

11.title: New Zealand: Adventure Capital of the World

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: If you're craving big adventure, we've got just the ticket. Get ready to leap, soar, roll, and climb to impossible heights in New Zealand, the Land of the Long Clouds. It's time to get into the zone, Kiwi style.

12.title: The World's Coolest Landmarks

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: We're looking for landmarks in all of the right places. From New York, to Neuschwanstein, to the Kremlin, and the White House. So if you're "leaning" toward adventure, get ready for 20 of the world's most celebrated landmarks.

13.title: The Coolest American Cities

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Bright lights...big cities. We're going cross-country to discover America the beautiful, and some of its coolest cities. From sea to shining sea, we're celebrating what makes these big cities uniquely American...and cool.

14.title: The Great Outdoors

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: We're camping out, diving in, and falling over. It's all about the great outdoors. From the coolest places to camp, to the awe and mystery under the sea; we're taking you into the heart of the great outdoors.

15.title: Coolest Places to Hike, Stargaze, and See Natural Landmarks

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Strap your boots and grab your pack because we're hiking some of the best and longest trails in the world. We're taking you to the icy tundra of Norwayl in search of the perfect place to gaze at the wonders of the night sky.

16.title: Northern Europe: From Iceland to Norway

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: We're heading to colder climes where we'll cross frosty fjords in Iceland, clash with mighty Vikings in Norway, and find out why there's nothing green in Greenland.

17.title: The Magic of Eastern and Central Canada

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Get ready to see The Great White North like you've never seen it before. We're hiking, skiing, and snowmobiling our way across Eastern and Central Canada, checking out the best of what these regions have to offer.

18.title: The Wilds of Western Canada and the Territories

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: We check out the wonders and wilds of Western Canada and the Territories, from the man-made heights of Vancouver skyscrapers to the majestic peaks of Banff National Park.

19.title: The Coolest Endurance Races

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Grab your running shoes, pump up your tires, and get ready to face some of the most intense endurance races on the planet. Coolest Places travels across the globe to find out what makes these competitions so tough.

20.title: Land of the Rising Sun

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: We travel across the globe to the capital of the Land of the Rising Sun - Tokyo, Japan. We'll dive into the city, check out the sights and figure out just what makes so many people want to live here.

21.title: Aloha Hawaii

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: The surf's up and the sun's out as we head to the Aloha State - Hawaii. Get ready to see the best sights of Hawaii's four biggest islands, from the gnarly waves of the North Shore to the beautiful jungles of Kauai.

22.title: Ten of the Coolest Places on Earth

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Get ready to experience some of the most memorable travel destinations in the world. From the bottom of the Great Barrier Reef to the top of the Empire State building, we'll take a look at what makes Earth so cool.

1.title: Even More Coolest Edurance Races

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: We travel to the craziest endurance races on the planet. From the Tundra of the Polar Circle, to the most active Volcano in Chile, we'll see what makes these races so wild, and why the athletes keep coming back.

2.title: Coolest Caves, Vistas, and natural Wonders

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: We climb into the world's coolest caves, see the most beautiful vistas, and discover the most dazzling natural wonders on the planet.

3.title: Coolest Buildings, Public Art and Parks

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: We visit the world's coolest buildings, including three of the tallest structures in the world, check out the most incredible public art, and see the most amazing public parks, including some dazzling treetops in Singapore.

4.title: Coolest Travel Facts and Figures

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Whether you're hiking, snorkeling, or eating out, it pays to know where to go, how to get there, and what to bring. Get the facts, figures, and tips you'll need to make your next trip perfect.

5.title: Adventure in Austria

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Get ready to scale the Alps and cut across the Blue Danube. In Austria, we'll pay a visit to Vienna, investigate some of the best alpine skiing, and see how a "salt castle" could become one the most beautiful cities in Europe.

6.title: Coolest Motorized Races

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: We're traveling around the world in search of the most intense, most dangerous, and most entertaining motorized races. We bushwhack through the rainforest in Malaysia, rip around the Isle of Man and race up Pike's Peak in Colorado.

7.title: Coolest Small Countries

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Some of the smallest countries in the world are the coolest. We travel the world and explore the tiny and amazing countries of Luxembourg, Liechtenstein, Grenada, Vatican City, San Marino, Monaco, and Swaziland.

8.title: Coolest Caribbean Islands

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Get ready for the ultimate Caribbean vacation. We island hop to some of the best beaches, resorts, and island villages in the world, sail across turquoise waters, soak up the sun on white sand beaches, and hike inland to climb waterfalls.

9.title: Coolest Cayman Islands Vacation

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: If you're in search of paradise, we may have found it. The islands of Little Cayman, Cayman Brac, and Grand Cayman showcase the true definition of the ultimate tropical vacation.

10.title: Central Europe Road Trip: Switzerland, France, Belgium

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: We head to Switzerland to ski the Swiss Alps, revel in the luxury and natural beauty of Midi-Pyrenees, tour the top seven spots in Paris, and cruise into Belgium for the local flavor.

11.title: The Coolest Islands on Earth

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: We take island hopping to the extreme. Get ready to bask in the sun of the South Pacific, uncover the mystery of Easter Island, hang with the locals on Kangaroo Island, horse around on Mackinac Island, and hit the beaches of Maui.

12.title: Coolest Scandinavian Adventure

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Time to head north for a crisp trip through Scandinavia. We find freedom in Finland, jaunt around the Aland Islands, hit the adventure sports in Sweden, go native in Norway, bike around Denmark, and discover the unknown Faroe Islands.

13.title: Coolest Places: Off the Beaten Path

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Get set for the forgotten, the surprising, and the completely unknown. We scuba dive in a cave in Madagascar, take a hot air balloon ride in Myanmar, get shipwrecked on the Dry Tortugas and survive the Badlands and Death Valley.

14.title: Coolest Roads Trips on Earth

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: We travel the world to find some of the best road trips. Time for an adventurous trip around New Zealand's North Island, a tour of the American West, and a trip to honor a famous sail boat race on the Great Lakes.

15.title: Coolest Malta Adventure

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: We sail to the islands of Malta in the Mediterranean for action, adventure, history, and tons of food. A classic car grand prix through historic streets, deep-sea fishing, diving for shipwrecks and a tour through medieval times.

16.title: Coolest Scotland Vacation

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Get ready for our trip to beautiful Scotland. We find the best mountain biking and whitewater rapids, take a tour of famous castles, check out vibrant cities, hit the beach, test out the food, and play a little golf.

17.title: Exotic Central and South America

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: We prepare to dive, dance, and sail our way to some of the warmest, coolest, and most exotic places in the world. We'll uncover ancient ruins in Belize, chill on blue glaciers in Argentina and kick up our heels in Aruba.

18.title: Living Well in Latvia

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: We head to the Baltic Sea region of Northern Europe to explore the country of Latvia. We'll discover some extraordinary medieval castles, kick back and relax at the spas, rub elbows with the cultural elite, and visit some festivals.

19.title: Adventures in Thailand

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: We head to where the rainforest meets the beach - Thailand. On our adventure we kiss an elephant, harness the wind and surf, shop from a riverboat, and ride one of the longest zip lines in the world.

20.title: The Coolest Sports on Earth

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Time to get active, as we travel around the world to discover the Coolest Sports on Earth. We bike, sled, swat, run, shoot, paddle, drive, and surf our way through the most adventurous, offbeat, and extreme sports on earth.

1.title: Coolest Ireland Vacation

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: It's coastal, rocky, artsy, and tasty. From the city of Dublin, and up the Wild Atlantic Way, we bike, hike, paddle, climb, and dance our way around Ireland. It's time to test the luck of the Irish on our Coolest Ireland Vacation.

2.title: Off the Beaten Path of the Mediterranean

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: For our second "off the beaten path" installment, we travel around the Mediterranean in search of the coolest unconventional getaways. From Sicily to Israel we discover the Mediterranean's eclectic history, culture, and adventure.

3.title: Discovering New Caledonia

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: We're jetting for the South Pacific, for some snorkeling, sailing, kayaking, and relaxing. This relatively unknown, wide-open archipelago is chock full of surprises around every corner.

4.title: Coolest Travel Trivia

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Time to test your travel knowledge. We've covered the globe for the best questions. Now we'll hike, kayak, fly, drive, and battle all the extremes that this planet can dish out, all in search of the answer.

5.title: Coolest Boat Races

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Hammer down the throttle, hoist the main sail, and hang on tight. We're hitting the water for some of the fastest, most prestigious, and most ridiculous races ever run on H2O.

6.title: Coolest Road Trips: Alaska & Canada

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Pack your trunks; we're driving through the North Country. From Seward, Alaska, to Ketchikan, Alaska with Canada in between. The historic Alaska-Canada Highway will take us through places like the Kluane National Park.

7.title: Coolest Crazy Extreme Sports

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: You think you know extreme sports? We're flipping extreme on its head, and getting even crazier. Kiteboarding in the snow, swimming with sharks, Volleyball with your feet and underwater hockey.

8.title: A Mexico Getaway

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: We're hitting all the best spots, like Cabo San Lucas, and Puerto Vallarta. Plus, we're going off the beaten path to discover some of Mexico's best kept secrets, amazing outdoor adventure, and some of the best beach resorts in the world.

9.title: Coolest European Cities

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Planning a European Vacation? We got you covered. Prague, London and Rome, sure, you have to hit those. What are some of the Coolest European Cities you didn't think about? We'll stroll the streets and find Europe's best-kept secrets.

10.title: Coolest Mountain Escapes

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Quite simply, we experience the best skiing and mountain retreats on earth. Whisk away to Whistler, tell your friends about Telluride, and swish with the Swiss in Switzerland. It's outdoor adventure at its peak.

11.title: Best Beach Getaways

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Need a break from the snow, or just a break from life? Come with us to the Bahamas, the South Pacific, Coastal North America and South America. We cover it all. All the surfing, snorkeling, and fun in the sun you can handle.

12.title: The Classic Mediterranean Cruise

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Ever dreamed of an exotic cruise to some of the most iconic and breath-taking places on earth? Well, this is it. Sail through the Straits of Gibraltar, barter in Barcelona and see what's so nice about Nice in the south of France.

13.title: Coolest Animal Lover Vacation

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: If you love animals, and love taking vacations, saddle up because this one's for you. Tame the wild on a safari, get up close at iconic zoos, snap photos of endangered species, and dive deep into the ocean's underwater kingdom.

14.title: Coolest Ecotourism Trips

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: For lovers of wildlife, we're hitting the coolest conservation and ecotourism spots on earth.

15.title: Off the Beaten Path 3: The American Southwest

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: As we trek the American southwest, one of the most iconic and well-recognized places on earth, we get away from the crowds and overplayed tourist attractions, and go rogue.

16.title: Coolest Water Adventures

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: From skimming across the blue waters of Lake Michigan on an antique schooner, to a luxury cruise of the Greek Islands, we're splashing around planet earth finding the most incredible water adventures.

17.title: Wild & Wacky America

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Freedom in American has lead to some wild inventions and wacky obsessions. We hit the heart of the United States for some unusual activities and historical events.

18.title: Coolest Seasonal Wonders

episode of.title: The Coolest Places on Earth (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: Catch 'em while you can. For a limited time only, some places on earth manage unbelievable, yet short-lived wonder.

imdb.title: The Coolest Places on Earth
akas: The Coolest Places on Earth (United States)
plot: _The Coolest Places on Earth_ (qv) takes viewers on a journey of discovery to astonishing places- cities, landmarks and jaw-dropping works of nature - exploring the history and learning why it deserves to be called one of the coolest places.
synopsis: The Coolest Places on Earth takes viewers on a journey of discovery to the most astonishing places on the planet cities, festivals, landmarks and jaw-dropping works of nature exploring each locations history and culture, learning why it deserves to be called one of the coolest places on earth!
